mapper.select: SELECT p.boardidx, p.universitycode, b.boardname, p.memberid, p.writedate, p.likenum, p.content, p.title FROM POST p JOIN BOARD b ON p.boardidx = b.boardidx WHERE b.boardname='공지사항' ORDER BY p.writedate DESC;
